title: Heretic
review: Masterful at keeping you hooked on the conversation, all the way through, but like {Incantation} it promises a religious experience at the end that is impossible to deliver on. I started to lose faith when it all went a bit {Jonathan Creek}. I wonder if this will become the source of new jokes that religious door-knockers will have to hear over and over, replacing {The Book of Mormon}. If you liked this, you might also like {Barbarian} or {Speak No Evil}.
